name: Party Mousenager
description:
VERY IMPORTANT:

Change the zoom of your website to 100%. No more, no less! The game will look weird if you don't! (Or maybe another %? Try holding the Control key, and use the mouse wheel to change zoom)

Made for the Brackeys' Game Jam 2020

https://itch.io/jam/brackeys-3

Welcome to the Mouse Party!

The PeepHole House is a club where you are the Mousenager and the Party has to be AWESOME!
Be the best party manager: Control the cost of a ticket, purchase upgrades, call Fa-Mouse mice for a better experience and make your party a succesfully party!

Choose who is allowed to come in and who isn't by watching through the peephole on the door.
But be careful, there are some dangers. Some mice are violent, and some are... well, you will have to find out. Have fun!

CREDITS
-------
Programming: Sergi Monreal Ibáñez, Kainaris Alzabaar
Art: Carlos Díaz Muñoz
Sound: Miquel Villalobos Verde
